name: Vacation Friends 2
description: A couple who meets up with another couple while on vacation in Mexico sees their friendship take an awkward turn when they get back home.

review.author: Dr_Breacher
review.heading: It's different, but nearly as good as the original
review.reviewBody:
I'm not sure why there are so many negative reviews, if you liked the first movie you are all but guaranteed to like the first half of this movie as it is very similar.

The second half of the movie is more like an unrealistic action comedy that is not to be taken seriously, but there are still some laughs to be had. I respect that they didn't copy the first movie throughout the entire film.

If you go into this movie expecting a masterpiece or for it to be exactly the same as the first movie you are going to be disappointed, but if you lower your expectations a little you will be entertained for the entire 100 minutes.
